name: Add new payee under pay bills

steps.name: the user accesses the Find Transactions tab
the user enters date range from "2012-09-01" to "2012-09-06"
clicks search
results table should only show transactions dates between "2012-09-01" to "2012-09-06"
the results should be sorted by most recent date
the user enters date range from "2012-09-02" to "2012-09-06"
clicks search
results table should only show transactions dates between "2012-09-02" to "2012-09-06"
the results table should only not contain transactions dated "2012-09-01"
the user accesses the Find Transactions tab
the user enters description "ONLINE"
clicks search
results table should only show descriptions containing "ONLINE"
the user enters description "OFFICE"
clicks search
results table should only show descriptions containing "OFFICE"
results table should not show descriptions containing "ONLINE"
the user accesses the Find Transactions tab
the user enters description "ONLINE"
clicks search
results table should only show descriptions containing "ONLINE"
the user enters description "online"
clicks search
results table should only show descriptions containing "ONLINE"
the user accesses the Find Transactions tab
clicks search
results table should show at least one result under "Deposit"
results table should show at least one result under "Withdrawal"
user selects type "Deposit"
clicks search
results table should show at least one result under "Deposit"
results table should show no result under "Withdrawal"
user selects type "Withdrawal"
clicks search
results table should show at least one result under "Withdrawal"
results table should show no result under "Deposit"
